name: Element_getElementsMatchingTextTest
description: Unit tests for the getElementsMatchingText method of the Element class.

test_cases.name: testGetElementsMatchingText_ValidRegex
test_cases.description: Tests the getElementsMatchingText method with a valid regex pattern.

test_cases.name: testGetElementsMatchingText_InvalidRegex
test_cases.description: Tests the getElementsMatchingText method with an invalid regex pattern, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.
